attributes.action: Construction of driver accessible toilets at all major bus stations during at all times
attributes.additional_details: The action i would like the government to take is to introduce a UK wide set of guidelines for local councils making it mandatory that during the local times of regular bus service operation at all major town stations there is toilet facilities available for drivers of buses. Who may arrive at a destination after over for hours of driving to discover that there are NO toilets available for them to use nearby either because shops won't let people use theirs or council workers have closed and locked public toilets.
